role.title: Message role
role.description: The role describes whether this message content is generated by the user i.e. the Enthalpy app or whether it is generated by the assistant i.e. the LLM.

userContent.title: Content for the user
userContent.description: Content to be sent to the user in case the role is assistant. Additional content sent to the user by the Enthalpy app in case the role is user.

workflowContent.title: Workflow Content
workflowContent.description: Interactions between the Enthalpy app & the LLM model.
